amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used in contravention of Article II, section 2 of the Constitution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of Article II, section 2 of the Constitution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A066) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
